binding.response:
${let result = golem:cart/api.{get}();
match result {  some(x) => {status: 200u64, body: x}, none => {status: 404u64, body: {message: "not found"}} } }

${let result = golem:cart/api.{add-item}(request.path.product-id, request.body.quantity);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: {message: "item added"}}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: {error: x}} } }

${let result = golem:cart/api.{checkout}();
match result {  ok(x) => {status: 200u64, body: x}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: {error: x}} } }

${let result = golem:cart/api.{update-billing-address}(request.body);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: {message: "address set"}}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: {error: x}} } }

${let result = golem:cart/api.{update-shipping-address}(request.body);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: {message: "address set"}}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: {error: x}} } }

${let result = golem:cart/api.{remove-item}(request.path.product-id);
match result {  ok(_) => {status: 200u64, body: {message: "item removed"}}, err(x) => {status: 400u64, body: {error: x}} } }
